raw_body: GONAWELA – MRS FLORENCE MARY (nee MARTINSTYNE) called to Rest on 23rd August 2023. Beloved wife of late Mr James Gonawela,​ sister of Noble,​ late Dora,​ Percy,​ Henry,​ Villie,​ Gordon,​ loving mother of Christopher,​ Andrew,​ Mervin,​ Aubrey,​ Patrick and Mark. Remains lie at “Restpect” 483,​ Bauddhaloka Mawatha,​ Colombo 08 from Saturday 26th August,​ 6.00 p.m. to 10.00 p.m. and Sunday 27th August 8.00 p.m. to 2.30 p.m. Cortege leaves Parlour for Service at Christ Church,​ Mission Road,​ Kotte at 3.00 p.m. and followed by the Burial at 3.30 p.m.053253
